name: Snake3D (Collin Patrick)
description:
Snake3D is a modern take on the classic game Snake by turning what was 2D into a full 3D experience. The snake can now move on a third axis; giving more dimension to the strategy of Snake. Snake3D also offers more game modes along with the classic way to play snake and features a variety of difficulty settings so everyone can play at their own speed.

This is a simple game I made in about a week to test how fast I can get through the entire development cycle with a simple game concept.
